mapper.insert: insert into Attendance( user_id, start_date, end_date, status, start_time, end_time, break_time, note ) values( #{userId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{breakTime}, #{note} )
mapper.update: update Attendance set end_date = #{endDate}, status = #{status}, end_time = #{endTime}, break_time = #{breakTime}, note = #{note} where attendance_id = #{attendanceId}
mapper.select: select user_id from attendance where attendance_id = #{attendanceId}
